_source.text: 1) Some active ingredients in total kill herbicides like bromacil, Prometon, different variations of glyphosate to name a few, will work in different areas better than others.

text: 1) Some active ingredients in total kill herbicides like bromacil, **Prometon**, different variations of **glyphosate** to name a few, will work in different areas **better** **than** others.

_source.text: 3. I've made three better-than-store-quality (with no high fructose corn syrup, modified corn starch, modified whey protein, xantham gum, carrageenan, guar gum, and whatever other dubious substrates are always in there) batches of ice cream!

text: 3. I've made three **better**-**than**-store-quality (with no high **fructose** corn syrup, modified corn
starch, modified whey protein, xantham gum, carrageenan, **guar** **gum**, and whatever other dubious substrates are always in there) batches of ice cream!
